body_html:
@colesbury I agree. I actually had tried to combine the operations, and it should work in most cases. I would say that there still some edge case that you just cannot fuse them.

By the way, I already have my way out namely using one-hot encoding.

body:
@colesbury I agree. I actually had tried to combine the operations, and it should work in most cases. I would say that there still some edge case that you just cannot fuse them.

By the way, I already have my way out namely using one-hot encoding.
